name: 2018/09/24 Dinner
description: Dive into a wholesome meal that blends high-sugar, high-fiber ingredients with a healthified twist. This unique mix of fruits, vegetables, and proteins offers a nutritious adventure perfect for those looking to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by washing the grapes, tangerines, and tomatoes under cold water. Peel the bananas and tangerines. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the cabbage, dice the white onion, and slice the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Boston Butt Roast by cutting it into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pot, bring water to a boil and carefully add the egg. Cook for 10 minutes for a hard-boiled egg.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pan, sauté the onions and Boston Butt Roast cubes until they are lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced cabbage and tomatoes to the pan, cooking until they're soft, approximately 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the mushroom soup according to the package instructions, then combine with the sautéed vegetables and meat in the pan. Let it simmer for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the rambutans and add them to the dish, allowing them to warm through for about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the dish with the peeled banana, tangerines, and hard-boiled egg on the side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
